channel.title: How do i make it so when i die in fight pits i dont loose items and go to pits?
channel.description:
I would like to know how to make it so hen som1 dies in fight pits (by npc or player) they do not loose items and get teleported back to the fight pits!
Can som1 tell me how to do this plz!
